title: LifecycleMoveAction
description: An action to move the entity to a different location. For eg: Move from Standard storage tier to Archive storage tier.

daysAfterCreation.description: Number of days after creation of the entity that the move should be triggered.

daysAfterModification.description: Number of days after last modification of the entity that the move should be triggered.

destination.description: Location where this entity needs to be moved to.

storageServiceType.description: The storage service to move this entity to.

storageClassType.description: The storage class to move this entity to.

location.description: The location where to move this entity to.
